title: BRIEF-Buru Energy Updates on Miani 1 Well Drilling
text:
BRIEF-Buru Energy Updates on Miani 1 Well Drilling

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 12:56)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Buru Energy Updates on Miani 1 Well Drilling Oct 21 (Reuters) - Buru Energy Ltd : * BURU ENERGY- MIANI 1 WELL DRILLING ENCOUNTERED A THICK SECTION OF TIGHT LIMESTONES WITH INTERMITTENT DOLOMITE AND HYDROTHERMALLY MINERALISED ZONES * BURU ENERGY LTD - MINOR HYDROCARBON SHOWS HAVE BEEN ENCOUNTERED IN SEVERAL ZONES AT MIANI 1 WELL DRILLING

BRIEF-Buru Energy Updates on Miani 1 Well Drilling
